name: Contraptions (itch)
description:
Important rules:

WAD - movement

S - provide power to blocks you touch

Q - turn on/off blocks

Connect blocks by right clicking on one block, dragging the mouse to the second block and releasing

Drag blocks while left clicking them

Connected blocks share power (i.e. a generator connected to an arrow will power the arrow, so long as the generator is on)

Blue blocks maintain their orientation when on (no power needed)

Orange blocks float at a level when on (no power needed)

Generators provide power when on

Arrow blocks move in the arrow's direction when powered

Brownn arrow blocks rotate in the arrow´s direction when powered

Structure blocks have no special function, are used only for building
